item.description:
Want an affordable night of dancing on New Year's Eve? Have no partner to share in the festivities? Have a partner, but want to share the festivities with others? Let's celebrate together, F. Scott Fitzgerald style. Join me for Boston Swing Central's New Year's Eve Great Gatsby Gala from 8 to 12:30. They're going to the Nines: There will be live music performed by The Fried Bananas, with special guest vocalist Jan Marie, a vintage photo booth, ladies vintage Salon, along with a prohibition midnight toast (non-alchoholic), and more to come. So don your 1920's vintage attire and get ready to ring in the new year with some wonderful swing dancing!

Tickets are the most affordable New Yea's Eve event in town: $18 by 12/1, $25 after 12/1.

Boston Swing Central is very accessible by car or by MBTA. directions to the venue
item.how_to_find_us: Tell them you're with Boston Swing Dancing MeetUp

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Eve Great Gatsby Gala
